solver.constraints.extension.binary

Class BinRelation

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.constraints.extension.binary.BinRelation

  • public abstract class BinRelation
extends Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean checkCouple(int x, int y)
      return true if couple (x,y) is feasible according to the definition of the relation. e.g if the relation is defined with infeasible tuples, it returns true if (x,y) is one of them.
      abstract BinRelation duplicate() 
      abstract boolean isConsistent(int x, int y)
      Test whether the couple (x,y) is consistent
